entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -21.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
